Level: 4
Category: Poison
Time: 30 minutes
Component Cost: see alchemical item Drowsy Dust
Market Price: 160 gp

When inhaled, the powder overwhelms a target, causing it to become sleepy and careless.

Drowsy Dust
Level 4 Uncommon

You blow the dust from the palm of your hand so it spreads through the air and clouds your opponent's senses.

Price: 80 gp
Alchemical Item

Power (Consumable • Poison): Standard Action. Make an attack: Ranged 2/5; +7 vs. Fortitude; the target takes a -2 penalty to defenses and a -5 penalty to Perception checks (save ends both).
